fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Place a temple at someone’s house each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players with a temple at their house will appear as Khmer to all investigative roles.
- When all living players have a temple, the game immediately ends in a Civilization win.
- You are detection immune, however anyone with a temple will appear as a Civilization.
- Anyone with a temple who attacks you will see that they were roleblocked, and their temple will be destroyed.
- You will know who has a temple on them each night.
- You may never perform the Factional Kill, even as the last Civilization standing.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value: “The Civilizations have won a religious victory!” (Win through Temples)
